summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5499 for the improvement of 45th Avenue South, from Cloverdale Street to a point about 500 feet south thereof; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 70281, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
